channel.title: Reset Rep?
channel.description:
Idk, i think atm, rep is just bullshit. Some people with 200 don't deserve it, and others with 200 got it a long time ago, when it was easy to get.
Then your thinking, omg, i earned my hard earned rep.
No.. Rep doesn't even matter anymore, no one cares about it.
200 is now way to common.
Discuss if you like, dislike.
Constructive criticism, and no spam/Flame.

item.title: Reset Rep?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

the elve age:

No… Rep doesn’t even matter anymore, no one has ever careds about it.

Fixed

Read full topic

item.title: Reset Rep?
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:58, topic:336655”][quote author=Budda link=topic=433025.msg3179903#msg3179903 date=1271205908]

I wouldn’t mind a reset. But only if people can only give +1 for now on. I know rep resets have been done before but with rep-- and if a change like I just mentioned was implemented, it might work

Rep-- is pointless because as soon as you get -1, there’s loads of people available to give them +13

With MoparScape you can’t expect the current system to work. The maturity of this forum is equivalent to that of an elementary school’s; you’ll still have people handing out reputation for the dumbest reasons.

rep++
[/quote]
See you guys giving out rep for posts, then how the fuck would this work.[/quote]

protip: my post was sarcasm
Read earlier posts, you’d note that I never rep rep++ anyone.

Read full topic

item.title: Reset Rep?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Moparisthebest:

If you think someone doesn’t deserve the rep they have, feel free to rep-- them. I’m not going to reset rep again, it’s been done 2 or 3 times and it simply doesn’t work. Plus now that rep-- is allowed it is simply not needed.

I agree with the fact that resetting it is pointless, but why don’t we try to revamp the system?

[quote=“Frell, post:19, topic:336655”]It needs to be reset and only vets should be allowed to rep. The position for vet will become more popular and wanted, and as the vets act like spies for good work people will be helping left and right.

Vets can still be nominated and rep will help them choose wisely for the next nomination, because rep will be more valuable then. If they see someone with 50 rep, they’ve only been repped by vets which means they probably did something good to deserve it, and they could become a potential nominee.

Any vet that is caught abusing rep will have their rep reset and blacklisted from ever becoming a veteran again.

Simple as.[/quote]

TeleNubby:

This actually would work

Archer:

This could work, worth a try.

noobs are ftw:

smart

the elve age:

I like the vet idea, to only give rep

Jc22493:

Frell’s idea is perfect.

The Reaper X:

Vets should be the only ones to give out rep, as they’ve been around long enough to know what deserves it.

The Soul:

Frell’s idea sounds perfect.

Jelenim:

Frell has best idea.

krackkid:

Meh who the fuck cares, do frell’s idea, then I will care.

dylan_0789:

Frells idea owns.

People seem to like it, so we could give it a shot rather than people constantly wanting it reset again. And if its so pointless right now, what could possibly happen if a new system fails?

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:37, topic:336655”]Something Taharok would post in this topic:

“The definition of insanity is doing the same thing over and over again and expecting different results”.

Rep has been reset before so it aint going to make a difference now.[/quote]
We get it, but when Taharok said that he drew all the attention away from trying to change the system and then the discussion died.

Read full topic

item.title: Reset Rep?
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

  1. All rep is just +1, doesn’t go up as yours does

  2. Rep reset of everyone besides veterans and community members

  3. add report abuse for rep (And if rep abuse is abused, ur rep is reset), When reported u keep the rep but the abuser gets -1, -5, or reset depending on abuse.

Rep should be very harsh and only for the members that absolutely deserve it. When you receive rep you should feel honored that someone took the time to recognize you.

Change is not easy, but it is always possible.

Read full topic

item.title: Reset Rep?
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

Vets should be the only ones to give out rep, as they’ve been around long enough to know what deserves it. With this set though, it would be a good idea to reset the reputation, because when new members come they’ll be looking at everyone with 200 rep while they have to get it the hard way.

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:37, topic:336655”]Something Taharok would post in this topic:

“The definition of insanity is doing the same thing over and over again and expecting different results”.

Rep has been reset before so it aint going to make a difference now.[/quote]I wish he still posted here. =\

Read full topic
